subsection.subsectiontext: The Provincial Court has jurisdiction in a claim for

paragraph.paragraphtext: specific performance of an agreement relating to personal property or services, or
relief from opposing claims to personal property

change.subsandwich: if the amount claimed or the value of the personal property or services is $10 000 or less, excluding interest and costs.
